name: FSkeletalMeshSamplingRegion
doc: Defined a named region on a mesh that will have associated triangles and bones for fast sampling at each enabled LOD.

Name: FName
Name of this region that users will reference.
LODIndex: The LOD of the mesh that this region applies to.
MaterialFilters: Filters to determine which triangles to include in this region based on material.
BoneFilters: Filters to determine which triangles and bones to include in this region based on bone.
bSupportUniformlyDistributedSampling:
Mesh supports uniformly distributed sampling in constant time.
Memory cost is 8 bytes per triangle.
